about.flavorBody: A friend of the pirate GuildBot. GuildBot sails the seven seas and collects data of all the ships.. um guilds of Habitica.

faq.question: Why does my guild not appear?
faq.answer: If your guild has just been created, or is under current investigation of the pirates, the guild will not show until completed.

faq.question: Why each guild has only one category assigned?
faq.answer: To avoid over classification, we only assign one category to one guild.

faq.question: Why can't find my language variant like Pirate English?
faq.answer: To avoid splintering of languages we group each language into a single group. The languages groups are based on the codes as specified ISO 2 (639-1) Letter Language. That being said, check out the summary for your group.
